channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: FAA takes first steps to restore flights after shutdown strain, but some limits remain
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration is rolling back some of its restrictions on commercial flights at 40 major U.S. airports that have been in place since Nov. 7.
